text: Dongnae Station () is a station of the Busan Metro Line 1 and Busan Metro Line 4 in Oncheon-dong and Myeongnyun-dong, Dongnae District, Busan, South Korea. The station is unrelated to the Dongnae Station of Korail. ==Station Layout== ===Line 1=== {|style="text-align:center;" |- | ↑ |- || S/B N/B |- | ↓ |} {| border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" frame="hsides" rules="rows" |- !
